alert.note: Alert for Deuel (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 6:23PM CDT until July 18 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Deuel County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 523 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lodgepole, or 7 miles west of Chappell, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chappell, Barton, Mount Vernon and Goldeneye State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 78 and 104. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
